title: 坏翻译
content:
作者：王馨语 | 评论(1) | 标签:翻译, google, 语言, 游戏, 网站, 娱乐, funnytranslator

此贴为娱乐性质，请报童将其拿下头条，谢谢。

介绍一个国外的网站，或者说是工具或玩具。我们知道，通过Google的翻译器，我们可以将一种语言翻译成许多其他语言，大概有几十种。我们也知道，它翻译的不准，经常还会闹笑话。

这个游戏是这样玩的：你输入任意语言(共支持58种语言)的一段话(最多250字/词)，然后选择你要翻译的次数，这个次数代表参与游戏的语言数目。

过程是这样的，假如我们选择了5种语言，即5次，然后我开始时输入了一个英文句子，那么第一次就是将这个英文句子翻译成第一个语言，再将结果再翻译回英文，再将得到的英文翻译成第二个语言，再会英文，以此类推。最多可以选择翻译56次，即让56种语言参与翻译。这样最后得到的还是跟你输入的句子的语言同样的语言结果，而这个结果会很出人意料，呵呵。就像一个复杂的方程，一个未知数，给这个未知数一个初始值，然后得到方程结果，再将方程结果作为未知数的值再计算，以此类推。

那么，我输入了一句著名的 “to be or not to be，that is a question.” 那么下面是结果过程：

AFRIKAANS : te wees of om nie te wees, dit is ‘n vraag

Back to ENGLISH : to be or not to be, it is a question

ALBANIAN : të jetë ose të mos jetë, kjo është një pyetje

Back to ENGLISH : to be or not, this is a question

ARABIC : أن تكون أو لا ، هذا هو السؤال

Back to ENGLISH : To be or not, this is the question

BELARUSIAN : Быць ці не, але гэта пытанне

Back to ENGLISH : To be or not, but it is a question

BULGARIAN : Да бъде или не, но това е въпрос

Back to ENGLISH : To be or not, but it is a matter

CATALAN : Ser o no, però és una qüestió

Back to ENGLISH : To be or not, but it is a matter

CHINESE : 是或不是，但它是一个问题

Back to ENGLISH : Is or is not, but it is a problem

CHINESE_SIMPLIFIED : 是或不是，但它是一个问题

Back to ENGLISH : Is or is not, but it is a problem

CHINESE_TRADITIONAL : 是或不是，但它是一個問題

Back to ENGLISH : Is or is not, but it is a problem

CROATIAN : Je li ili nije, ali je problem

Back to ENGLISH : Whether or not, but the problem

CZECH : Zda nebo ne, ale tento problém

Back to ENGLISH : Whether or not, but the problem

DANISH : Hvorvidt eller ej, men problemet

Back to ENGLISH : Whether or not, but the problem

DUTCH : Of niet, maar het probleem

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

ESTONIAN : Või mitte, kuid probleem

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

FILIPINO : O hindi, ngunit ang problema

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

FINNISH : Tai ei, mutta ongelma

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

FRENCH : Ou pas, mais le problème

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

GALICIAN : Ou non, pero o problema

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

GERMAN : Oder auch nicht, aber das Problem

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

GREEK : Ή όχι, αλλά το πρόβλημα

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

HAITIAN_CREOLE : Oswa ou pa, men pwoblèm nan

Back to ENGLISH : Or no, but the problem

HEBREW : או לא, אבל את הבעיה

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

HINDI : या नहीं, लेकिन समस्या

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

HUNGARIAN : Vagy nem, de a probléma

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

ICELANDIC : Eða ekki, en vandamálið

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

INDONESIAN : Atau tidak, tapi masalahnya

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

IRISH : Nó nach bhfuil, ach ar an bhfadhb

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

ITALIAN : Oppure no, ma il problema

Back to ENGLISH : Or not, but the problem

JAPANESE : またははなく、問題

Back to ENGLISH : Or no problem

KOREAN : 아니면 아무 문제가

Back to ENGLISH : Or no problem

LATVIAN : Vai nav problēma

Back to ENGLISH : Do not be a problem

LITHUANIAN : Ne problema

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

MACEDONIAN : Нема проблем

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

MALAY : Tiada masalah

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

MALTESE : Ebda problema

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

NORWEGIAN : Ikke noe problem

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

PERSIAN : مشکلی نیست

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

POLISH : Nie ma problemu

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

PORTUGUESE : Não há problema

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

PORTUGUESE_PORTUGAL : Não há problema

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

ROMANIAN : Nici o problemă

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

RUSSIAN : Нет проблем

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

SERBIAN : Нема проблема

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

SLOVAK : Žiadny problém

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

SLOVENIAN : Ni problema

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

SPANISH : No hay problema

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

SWAHILI : Hakuna tatizo

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

SWEDISH : Inga problem

Back to ENGLISH : No problem

TAGALOG : Walang problema

Back to ENGLISH : No hassle

THAI : ไม่ยุ่งยาก

Back to ENGLISH : No hassle.

TURKISH : No güçlük.

Back to ENGLISH : No hassle.

UKRAINIAN : Ніяких труднощів.

Back to ENGLISH : No difficulties.

VIETNAMESE : Không có khó khăn.

Back to ENGLISH : No problems.

WELSH : Dim problemau.

Back to ENGLISH : No problems.

YIDDISH : ניט קיין פראבלעמען.

Back to ENGLISH : No problems.

最后的结果是No problems. 呵呵，你也去试试吧，可以输入中文的。我觉得这里面可能有些哲学，但是我说不出来是什么！！！你觉得呢？

地址：http://funnytranslator.com/
